Operating Systems based on Z80 Family

If there are popular operating system based on Z80 family, you know of or you would like to point to, please tell me, or - even better - contact me if you are ready to maintain any "z80os*" sub page not yet existing, nicely fitting into my Z80 series of documents.

Table-of-Contents
  • Monitor Type "OS"

    • CP/M
  • Multi-Tasking OS
    • MP/M

  • Real-Time OS
  • Miscellaneous OS
  • Info and URLs are missing

Monitor Type "Operating System"

  • Monitors ($)for Z80 also
    by Dave Dunfield.
  • Sorry: nothing more, yet !!!
    Come on, folks! Get me URLs!

Operating System CP/M

  • CP/M Page of John Elliott
  • The CP/M FAQ (HTTP)
  • The CP/M Unofficial Web Page (*)
    since the death of Tim Olmstead, maintained by Gaby Chaudry, with new license from Lineo
    • Mirror (UK)
  • The Computer Center (*)
    Computer Museum and Software Repository
    Look for CPMUG
  • Walnut Creek CP/M CDROM is not available anymore,
    once offered by Walnut Creek CDROM
    You could try BBS at 617-965-7046
    operated by Jay Sage (run the command "JOIN CDROM")
    Probably ...
    • will make you a copy (US)
      or
    • Stefan G. Farnell (UK)
      or
    • Helmut Jungkunz (Germany) offers a copy
      or
    • Les Hildenbrandt offering an exact copy of the Walnut Creek CD-ROM.
      The disk contains: 
       Assemblers, compilers, code librarys, and programming tools
 Editors, word processors, spreadsheet, calculators, and other apps
 Disc, printer, modem, and other systems utilities
 Archive and compression tools
 Telecommunication software for users and bbs operators
 Articles from users' group journals and other publications
 Games and educational software
 Help files
 CP/M emulators and tools for working with CP/M files 
 under DOS, OS/2, and Unix
      Over 19,000 files in all!
    • ... and but who knows? Probably Kelly Fergason will once in a while offer his own collection of CP/M stuff
    • ... or S.U.S.E.
    • The CP/M Commercial Software Archive is dedicated to preserving the remaining commercial software available for CP/M. Maintained by Gene Buckle

    NZCOM, Z3PLUS

    • They are now free and can be downloaded from www.gaby.de, including documentation. More manuals can be found here
    • For Z-system/ZCPR software please check out the ZNODE51 BBS (HTTP)

    Operating System MP/M

    • Check out the Unofficial CP/M Website

    Operating System UZI

    • UZI OS for the Z80 - It's the website of the creator of UZI.
    • UZI-180 Operating System
      by Hal Bower

    Real-Time OS

    • HACK-Real-time Operating System for ZiLOG's eZ80Acclaim! based microcontrollers: eZ80F91, eZ80F92, eZ80F93.
    • NuttX Real-Time Operating System, NuttX is a real-time operating system (RTOS) with an emphasis on standards compliance and small footprint.

    Miscellaneous

    • L2 (EUMEL)
    • Future OS, CPC Operating System (German)
    • SymbOS, multi-tasking Operating System for the Amstrad CPC, MSX and Amstrad PCW/JOYCE.
    • MINIX
    • XENIX
    • XINU
    • XINU
    • T-DOS, upgrade of CP/M 2.2 that was released on the Coleco Adam.
